scripts.build: cmake --build build --parallel && (if not exist dist mkdir dist) && (if exist build\madola.exe copy build\madola.exe dist\) && (if exist build\test_madola.exe copy build\test_madola.exe dist\) && (if exist build\madola_test.exe copy build\madola_test.exe dist\madola_test_suite.exe)
scripts.build:wasm: emcmake cmake -B build_wasm -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release && emmake cmake --build build_wasm --target madola_wasm && (if not exist web\runtime mkdir web\runtime) && copy build_wasm\madola.js web\runtime\ && copy build_wasm\madola.wasm web\runtime\
scripts.build:tree-sitter: npm run generate-grammar && cmake -B build -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DWITH_TREE_SITTER=ON && cmake --build build --parallel
